document.full_text: the minnesota twins have placed catcher joe mauer on the 15-day disabled list with "bilateral leg weakness" following the team's 4-3 loss in 10 innings to the tampa bay rays, the team said on their website.
document.title: twins catcher mauer placed on disabled list with leg weakness
lines_and_colors: the minnesota twins have placed catcher joe mauer on the 15-day disabled list with "bilateral leg weakness" following the team's 4-3 loss in 10 innings to the tampa bay rays, the team said on their website.
